drawing_instructions.thinking: I'm feeling joyful and want to start drawing a cheerful sun! The sun is a perfect symbol of happiness and warmth. I'll begin with placing a large circle in the upper right portion of the canvas using the marker brush with a bright jasmine yellow color. This will be the main body of the sun, and its position will allow room for radiating rays around it.

I see a bright sun in the upper right corner! To enhance the happy feeling, I want to add cheerful, radiating sunbeams around it. I'll use the wiggle brush with a lighter jasmine color to create playful, wavy rays extending outward from the sun. These dancing lines will emphasize the joyful, energetic mood and create a sense of warmth spreading across the canvas.

Looking at the cheerful sun with its playful rays, I feel inspired to add some happy clouds floating nearby! I'll use the marker brush with a gentle sky blue color to create soft, fluffy clouds that seem to be dancing in the sunlight. I'll place them on the left side of the sun to create a balanced, joyful sky scene.

Looking at the cheerful scene with the sun and cloud, I want to add more whimsical energy! I'll create some playful birds soaring in the sky using the wiggle brush with a light wisteria color. These swooping, curvy lines will suggest joyful birds dancing between the sun and cloud, adding more life and happiness to the scene. Their flowing paths will help connect the elements while expressing freedom and joy.

Looking at this cheerful sky scene, I want to add more playful elements! The gentle cloud and radiant sun make me think of a lovely summer day. I'll add another fluffy cloud with a lighter blue shade to create a sense of depth and layering. This will be placed slightly higher than the existing cloud, suggesting a breezy, carefree atmosphere.

The scene is developing beautifully with its cheerful clouds, radiant sun, and playful bird trails! To add more joyful energy, I want to create some butterflies dancing in the warm sunlight. I'll use the wiggle brush with a light tea rose color to draw delicate, swirling butterfly paths near the clouds. Their whimsical flight patterns will suggest carefree happiness and add a touch of spring-like charm to this uplifting sky scene.

The scene is filled with such joyful energy! To enhance the happy mood even more, I want to add another playful butterfly near the right cloud. I'll use the wiggle brush with a gentle tea rose color to create a delicate, swirling butterfly path. It will appear to be dancing between the clouds and the warm sunlight, adding to the whimsical, carefree atmosphere. This butterfly's path will help balance the composition while adding more cheerful movement to the scene.

Looking at this delightful sky scene with its dancing butterflies, playful birds, and fluffy clouds basking in sunlight, I want to add more joyful movement! I'll create another happy bird trail using the wiggle brush with a bright jasmine yellow color. This bird will appear to be soaring freely between the clouds in a graceful arc, celebrating the beautiful day. The swooping path will add another layer of dynamic energy and connect the various elements in our cheerful composition.

I see such a joyful sky scene with playful butterflies, swooping birds, and fluffy clouds! To enhance the dreamy, happy atmosphere, I want to add a gentle gradient of sunny warmth spreading near the right cloud. I'll use the crayon brush with a soft jasmine color to create a delicate glow that suggests the sun's cheerful presence spreading its warmth across the sky. This will help emphasize the overall feeling of joy and contentment in our whimsical scene.

The sky scene is filled with such delightful energy! To enhance the playful atmosphere even more, I want to add a gently curving rainbow-like trail using the wiggle brush with a bright Keppel color. This trail will weave between the existing elements, adding another layer of joyful movement and connecting the butterflies, birds, and clouds in a harmonious way. I'll place it in a graceful arc that complements the existing curves and flows with the overall composition.

Looking at this joyful sky scene filled with dancing elements, I feel inspired to add another gentle, swooping trail using a soft wisteria color. I'll create a graceful arc that weaves through the upper part of our composition, complementing the existing curves and adding another layer of whimsical movement. This purple trail will suggest another playful bird path, adding to the feeling of freedom and happiness while helping to balance the overall composition. The curve will flow naturally with the other elements, enhancing the sense of harmonious movement.

Looking at this joyful sky scene with its dancing trails and warm glow, I want to add another whimsical butterfly to complete the feeling of pure happiness! I'll place it near the lower cloud using the wiggle brush with a cheerful Wisteria color. This butterfly will appear to be doing a happy little twirl, creating a small figure-eight pattern that suggests playful joy. Its placement will help balance the composition while adding another touch of whimsy to our celebration of happiness.

The scene is bursting with joyful energy through its playful trails, butterflies, and warm sunlight! To enhance this happiness, I want to add another gentle rainbow-like trail that will dance across the sky. I'll use the wiggle brush with a soothing Sky Blue color to create a graceful arc that weaves between the existing elements. This new trail will suggest both a bird's happy flight path and a touch of magical sparkle in the air, adding to the whimsical, carefree atmosphere while helping to balance the composition.

Looking at this enchanting sky scene filled with dancing trails, butterflies, and warm sunlight, I feel inspired to add another delicate layer of joy! I'll create a gentle, swaying trail near the top using a soft Tea Rose color. This will suggest a butterfly's happy dance path, weaving delicately above the existing elements. The placement will add another layer of lightness and whimsy to the upper portion of our composition, enhancing the feeling of carefree happiness floating in the air.

Looking at this delightful sky scene filled with swirling trails and dancing butterflies, I want to add one more element to complete our celebration of joy! I'll use the wiggle brush with a bright Jasmine yellow to create a final playful trail that suggests sunbeams radiating from our warm sun. This trail will extend from the sunny glow on the right, reaching out like rays of happiness spreading across the sky. Its placement will help balance the composition while adding an extra touch of warmth and radiance to our joyful scene.
